about_the_game:
Tesarcheon is a 2D RPG adventure that immerses you in a magical, ever-expanding world, full of vibrant pixel art and lively environments. Step into the role of an explorer searching for a unique path: will you rise as the supreme mage, battling hordes of monsters and iconic bosses, or find peace as a humble farmer, nurturing a community and surrounded by the love of animals?

               

In Tesarcheon, freedom is your greatest ally. Face mystical creatures and challenging bosses to unlock magical powers and evolve your character on a journey of constant growth. Build and cultivate your own farm, care for animals, and gather essential resources to ensure your survival. Encounter unique characters, each with fascinating stories and traits, and form alliances with guilds and clans to increase your power and influence.

Explore villages and cities—or create your own settlements. Adventures await in mysterious dungeons, where secrets and ancient treasures lie for the bold to discover. Live a life as a true god of this world, expanding your knowledge and power, or choose the peaceful life of a farmer, embraced by the love of animals and simple joys.

Whether you're seeking an intense RPG experience or a tranquil journey, Tesarcheon gives you the freedom to create the destiny you desire. This vast world of magic, challenges, and choices is waiting for you!

  • Processor: Dual Core
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GT 710 | AMD Radeon R5 230 (1GB VRam)
  • DirectX: Version 11

Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Quad Core
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050 | AMD Radeon RX 550 (4GB VRam)
